sn56.20:0.2: 2. Rolling Forth the Wheel of Dhamma
sn56.20:1.1: “Mendicants, these four things are real, not unreal, not otherwise.
sn56.20:1.6: ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’ …
sn56.20:1.7: These four things are real, not unreal, not otherwise.
sn56.20:2.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
